==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かり|な}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かりな}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かな|仮|tr1=kari|t1=borrowing; provisional thing|pos1=cognate with verb {{m|ja|借る}} ''karu'', “to borrow”, the {{etyl|ojp|-}} form of modern {{m|ja|借りる}} ''kariru''|字|tr2=na|t2=name, character}}, from the way that Chinese characters were borrowed for their phonetic values to spell out the sounds of native Japanese words.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

In contrast to {{m|ja|真名|tr=mana||true name, true character}}, a synonym for {{m|ja|漢字|tr=kanji}}, indicating Chinese characters used for the meaning instead of for their sound.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=k|かりな|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|仮字}} {{qualifier|rare}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かりな|kyu=假名}}

# a category of Japanese [[syllabary]] scripts: [[kana]]
# a [[syllabogram]], an individual character belonging to one of the syllabaries: [[kana]]
# a [[temporary]] name, an [[alias]]

=====Antonyms=====
{{der-top|Antonyms}}
* {{sense|alias}} {{ja-r|実名|じつめい}}: [[actual]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|本名|ほんみょう}}: [[real]] [[name]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{sense|alias}} {{ja-r|変名|へんめい}}: [[changed]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|偽名|ぎめい}}: [[false]] or [[fictitious]] [[name]]
{{der-bottom}}

# a category of Japanese [[syllabary]] scripts: [[kana]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=j|か|な}}

{{IPAchar|/karina/}} → {{IPAchar|/kanna/}} → {{IPAchar|/kana/}}

Contraction of ''kanna'' above.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=j|かな|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|仮字}} {{qualifier|rare}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かな|kyu=假名}}

# a category of Japanese syllabary scripts: [[kana]]
# a [[syllabogram]], an individual character belonging to one of the syllabaries: [[kana]]
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|86}}
#*: '''Cana'''. カナ (仮名・仮字) 日本の文字の一種. Cananiyù. (仮名に言ふ) 皆の人がわかるように, やさしく話す.

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|か|めい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かめい}} {{m|zh|假名|tr=kæ<sup>X</sup> mjieng|lit=borrowed; false + name}}. [[漢音#Japanese|Kan'on]], so probably a somewhat later borrowing from Chinese. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''gaa<sup>2</sup> meng<sup>4-2</sup>''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=ko|かめい|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かめい|kyu=假名}}

# an [[assumed]] name: an [[alias]], [[sobriquet]], [[pen name]]

=====Antonyms=====
{{der-top|Antonyms}}
* {{ja-r|実名|じつめい}}: [[actual]] [[name]]
* {{ja-r|本名|ほんみょう}}: [[real]] [[name]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{ja-r|変名|へんめい}}: [[changed]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|偽名|ぎめい}}: [[false]] or [[fictitious]] [[name]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|け|みょう}}
{{IPAchar|/kemjau/}} → {{IPAchar|/kemjɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/kemjoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けみょう}} {{m|zh|假名|tr=kæ<sup>X</sup> mjieng|lit=borrowed; false + name}}. [[呉音#Japanese|Goon]], so probably an earlier borrowing from Chinese. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''ké-miâ''.

The Buddhist sense derives from use of this term in Chinese as a translation of the {{etyl|sa|-}} term {{m|sa|प्रज्ञप्ति||appointing → provisional naming}}, used in some Buddhist schools to refer to the practice of conceptualising and naming things that are not real.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=go|けみょう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|けみょう|kyu=假名|hhira=けみやう}}

# an [[assumed]] name: an [[alias]], [[sobriquet]], [[pen name]]
# in [[feudal]] Japan, a [[public]] [[name]] given to [[boy]]s upon [[coming of age]], after which their birth names would be kept [[private]]
# a [[provisional]] name given to someone when the real name is unknown: compare English {{m|en|Jane Doe}}, {{m|en|John Doe}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=けみょう|Buddhism}} the [[conceptualisation]] and [[provisional]] [[naming]] of things that are not real; something so named

=====Antonyms=====
{{der-top|Antonyms}}
* {{sense|alias}} {{ja-r|実名|じつめい}}: [[actual]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|本名|ほんみょう}}: [[real]] [[name]]
* {{sense|public name}} {{ja-r|実名|じつめい}}: [[actual]] [[name]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{der-top|Synonyms}}
* {{sense|alias}} {{ja-r|変名|へんめい}}: [[changed]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|偽名|ぎめい}}: [[false]] or [[fictitious]] [[name]]
* {{sense|public name}} {{ja-r|呼び名|よびな}}: [[calling]] or [[addressing]] [[name]]; {{ja-r|通称|つうしょう}}: [[common]] [[appellation]]; {{ja-r|俗称|ぞくしょう}}: [[popular]] or [[everyday]] [[appellation]]
{{der-bottom}}
